org.pac4j.core.authorization.authorizer

Interface Authorizer<U extends CommonProfile>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCheckAuthenticationAuthorizer, AbstractRequireAllAuthorizer, AbstractRequireAnyAuthorizer, AbstractRequireElementAuthorizer, CacheControlHeader, CheckHttpMethodAuthorizer, CheckProfileTypeAuthorizer, CorsAuthorizer, CsrfAuthorizer, CsrfTokenGeneratorAuthorizer, IpRegexpAuthorizer, IsAnonymousAuthorizer, IsAuthenticatedAuthorizer, IsFullyAuthenticatedAuthorizer, IsRememberedAuthorizer, ProfileAuthorizer, RequireAllPermissionsAuthorizer, RequireAllRolesAuthorizer, RequireAnyAttributeAuthorizer, RequireAnyPermissionAuthorizer, RequireAnyRoleAuthorizer, StrictTransportSecurityHeader, XContentTypeOptionsHeader, XFrameOptionsHeader, XSSProtectionHeader

    public interface Authorizer<U extends CommonProfile>
    Checks if an access is authorized.
    Since:
    1.8.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isAuthorized(WebContext context, List<U> profiles)
      Checks if the user profiles and / or the current web context are authorized.

    • Method Detail

      • isAuthorized

        boolean isAuthorized(WebContext context,
                     List<U> profiles)
        Checks if the user profiles and / or the current web context are authorized.
        Parameters:
        context - the web context
        profiles - the user profiles
        Returns:
        if the access is authorized
